solution_line_template: He needs {calories_needed_from_pb} calories worth of peanut butter because {total_desired_calories} - {calories_per_bread_piece} = <<{total_desired_calories}-{calories_per_bread_piece}={calories_needed_from_pb}>>{calories_needed_from_pb}

He needs {servings_of_pb} servings of peanut butter because {calories_needed_from_pb} / {calories_per_pb_serving} = <<{calories_needed_from_pb}/{calories_per_pb_serving}={servings_of_pb}>>{servings_of_pb}
